body:
well there is a method hasPermanentMenuKey which checks if the hardware MenuKey is present, usually samsung devices has it on left size of Home button.

So if it returns true it means the phone has hardware keys and if its false then simply it means phone has navigation bar.

The method is:

ViewConfiguration.hasPermanentMenuKey()

I find it pretty usefull for myself. I hope it helps
title: Detect soft navigation bar availability in onePlusOne device progmatically?
